nodes.text: Sardonne Sardon was a lawyer. She was present at the Trial of Tahiri Veila in its later stages, defending Tahiri Veila along with Eramuth Bwua'tu.

Sardonne Sardon's portrayal in Fate of the Jedi: Vortex is rather inconsistent in terms of species. When she is first introduced on page 160 of the novel, she is identified as a Lorrdian female. However, in a scene later in the novel, she is described as a Falleen, complete with the species' dorsal spines, face scales, small claws on her fingers, and usage of pheromones to manipulate others' emotions. This discrepancy has not yet been addressed.
